Description: Stable identifier used to join to other metadata files. Prefer a DOI (Digital Object Identifier a persistent identifier for a dataset or publication) when available; otherwise use a stable local identifier.
Short description of the dataset contents and purpose.
Name(s) of primary creator(s) or project.
Start date or year covered by the dataset (ISO 8601 where possible).
End date or year covered by the dataset.
Textual description of spatial coverage (e.g. CUs or regions or coordinates).
Free-text citation for publications or reports or internal docs.
Timestamp when dataset was last modified (ISO 8601).
